subject: ci(deploy): add GitHub Pages deployment workflow
body:
Automated deploy pipeline: lint → test → build → deploy to GitHub Pages
on push to main. Uses official GitHub actions (configure-pages, upload-pages-artifact,
deploy-pages) with OIDC token auth — no PAT or deploy key needed.

Requires enabling Pages with "GitHub Actions" source in repo settings.

Tags: ci, deploy, github-pages, infrastructure
Complexity: 2
Urgency: 2
Impact: infrastructure
Risk: low
Debt: neutral
Epic: pwa-hardening
Semver: minor
